name: emuBro
description: emuBro is an open source retro game launcher that associates your retro games with your emulators such as snes9x, epsxe, pcsx2, dolphin, cemu or whatever you like.

scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('Root postinstall: run `npm install` inside `tauri/` for Tauri deps.')"
scripts.sync:assets: npm run sync:resources && npm run sync:gamelist
scripts.legacy:electron:preelectron-builder: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try{fs.rmSync('build_out/win-unpacked',{recursive:true,force:true});}catch(e){console.error('[clean] failed to remove build_out/win-unpacked:', e.message); process.exit(1);}"
scripts.legacy:electron:build:win: npm run sync:assets && npm run legacy:electron:builder -- --win --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.legacy:electron:build:win:offline: npm run sync:assets && npm run legacy:electron:builder -- --win nsis --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.legacy:electron:build:win:web: npm run sync:assets && npm run legacy:electron:builder -- --win nsis-web --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.legacy:electron:build:linux: npm run sync:assets && npm run legacy:electron:builder -- --linux --x64 --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.legacy:electron:build:mac: npm run sync:assets && npm run legacy:electron:builder -- --mac --x64 --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never

author: sysout
